grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 暦年【レキネン】calendar year, civil year, time, year after year
改暦【カイレキ】calendar reform, adoption of new calendar system, new calendar (for a new year), new year
暦応【リャクオウ】Ryakuō era (of the Northern Court) (1338.8.28-1342.4.27), Rekiō era
康暦【コウリャク】Kōryaku era (of the Northern Court) (1379.3.22-1381.2.24)
kun reading compounds: 暦改正【こよみかいせい】calendar reform
